description.content:
With over a decade of industry experience, I have learned that my most valuable contributions can be defined as building and translating.

While applying logic and reason to every situation, a process-oriented mentality helps me translate user’s needs, designer choices, and code paths to build the right solution to practical problems.

position-primary.title: eCom Web Developer
position-primary.description: New Zealand started outdoor apparel company offering customers a natural alternative to synthetics through Merino wool. Offering product via wholesale, retail, and eCommerce. Joining the eCom team in Portland and later relocating the the Auckland office I was able to be part of this global group of people who want to make a difference, who share common beliefs and who have the courage to go their own way.

position.title: Senior UX Engineer
position.description: Copious' work simplifies the complex, enriches the transactions a user has with their clients’ brands, and includes custom web applications, ecommerce experiences, and mobile apps. They focus on architecting, designing and building human-centered digital and ecommerce experiences.

position.title: Senior Interactive
position.description: Kinesis is a strategic marketing and design firm based in Portland, Oregon. They specialize in high-impact web design, graphic design, and marketing services for growth-oriented businesses.

position.title: Co-founder
position.description: Jugtown Vinyl is an online store that offers unique vinyl applique artwork directly to consumers.
